articles.title: Trump threatens to hold up stadium deal if Washington Commanders don't switch back to Redskins | CBC Sports
articles.description: President Donald Trump is threatening to hold up a new stadium deal for Washington's NFL team if it does not restore its old name of the Redskins, which was considered offensive to Native Americans.
